description: This file defines configuration settings for the 'agno' CLI application using Pydantic models, including environment-based URL updates and validation logic.

classes.name: AgnoCliSettings
classes.description: A Pydantic-based configuration class for the 'agno' CLI, managing environment-specific URLs, paths, and validation.

methods.name: validate_runtime_env
methods.description: Validates the 'api_runtime' value to be one of 'dev', 'stg', or 'prd'.

methods.name: update_cli_auth_url
methods.description: Updates the CLI authentication URL based on the 'api_runtime' environment.

methods.name: update_signin_url
methods.description: Updates the signin URL based on the 'api_runtime' environment.

methods.name: update_playground_url
methods.description: Updates the playground URL based on the 'api_runtime' environment.

methods.name: update_api_url
methods.description: Updates the API URL based on the 'api_runtime' environment and environment variables.

methods.name: gate_alpha_feature
methods.description: Logs an error and exits if 'alpha_features' is disabled.
